name: Playroom (Endeawolf)
description:
Backstory

Noor just transferred to a local boarding school and assigned into Mawar Dormitory. Mawar Dormitory has a yearly tradition of hosting an event called Playroom. The participant is chosen amongst the new students by the dorm leader, Imah. She prepared a test for Noor in a peculiar room with a connecting bathroom, different from their dorm room. Imah left a message telling Noor what she need to do to leave the room. Noor is required to complete the test given by Imah before she is allowed to leave the room. She also left a caution message about other students who love pulling prank by the windows.

Mechanics Task SystemThere are 6 questions overall with each level consists of 2 questions. Player need to find 4-digits code and key-in the code using the number pad. If the answer is correct, it will record the answer in the progress bar.Window SystemThe room has 4 interactable windows. At a specific time interval, a window will automatically open. If the window is left open more than 10 seconds, it will be game over. Developer Note

Thank you for taking an interest in this project.

The game is initially developed with a purpose to investigate the effects of pressure to every player and how it differs to each individual.  The playtesting is done physically in the same room to observe players' behaviors and evaluate the reasons behind their actions in the game.

Have fun & Stay safe
